summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Joboost French job search platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality working with minor session management issues.

integration_issues.issue: Users get logged out after some time, requiring re-authentication to access dashboard

passed_tests: Applications CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/applications)
Landing page loads with French content and proper styling
Registration page form submission and validation
Login page form submission and authentication
Dashboard Kanban view with French columns (À faire, Postulé, Entretien, Offre, Refusé)
Pricing page displays plans (Gratuit, Pro Mensuel, Pro Annuel) with correct pricing
French language content throughout the application
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management issue where users get logged out and redirected to login page when accessing dashboard. Consider implementing token refresh or extending session duration.
